author: Susie Madrak
title: Your Complete Guide To The First 2016 Democratic Debate
text:
sharethis 10/13/15 7:45am TRENTON -- Hillary Clinton, Bernie Sanders, and the other three candidates for the Democratic presidential nomination will face off Tuesday night in their first debate of the 2016 race. Here is what you need to know heading in: WHEN: The debate will begin at 8:30 p.m. Eastern time and will run two hours. WHERE TO WATCH:â€¦ Bernie Sanders , Gov. Lincoln Chafee , Gov. Martin O'Malley , Hillary Clinton , Sen. Jim Webb Comments
